content:
Name: Susan Green

Demographics:
Age: 55
Gender: Female
Location: suburban or rural area
Occupation: Real Estate Agent
Income: median income of $61,140 (2019)

Education:
Bachelor's degree in Real Estate or related field

Personality:

* Detail-oriented and organized
* Strong customer focus and interpersonal skills
* Adaptable and continuously learning
* Tech-savvy with a good understanding of the local market

Work Habits:

* Work independently with support from brokerages
* Build and maintain strong relationships with clients and colleagues
* Active member of the local real estate community
* Maintains up-to-date knowledge of real estate trends and regulations

Pain Points:

* Limited access to marketing resources
* Difficulty tracking and analyzing marketing performance
* Competition from other agents and brokerages
* Keeping up with the latest real estate technology and trends

Goals:

* Boost visibility and reputation
* Increase lead generation and conversion
* Stay ahead of the competition
* Streamline and improve marketing efforts

Technology Usage:

* CRM software for managing clients and properties
* Email marketing and communication tools
* Social media for personal and professional use
* Open to adopting new technology to improve work efficiency and success

Marketing Channels:

* Online listings and advertising
* Networking events and referrals
* Direct mail and email marketing
* Social media advertising

Marketing Budget:

* Balances cost-effectiveness with the need for quality results
* Continuously monitors and adjusts budget based on performance results
* Willing to invest in marketing solutions that can demonstrate ROI
* Utilizes brokerages' marketing resources and support where available.
